name: Get OCI Image
description: Download OCI image from Docker Registry and import to Proxmox storage

parameters.name: OCI Image
parameters.description: OCI image reference (e.g., docker://alpine:latest, docker://debian:bookworm, oci://ghcr.io/owner/repo:latest)

parameters.name: Storage
parameters.description: Proxmox storage where the OCI image should be stored

parameters.name: Registry Username
parameters.description: Username for registry authentication (optional, required for private images)

parameters.name: Registry Password
parameters.description: Password for registry authentication (optional, required for private images)

parameters.name: Registry Token
parameters.description: Bearer token for registry authentication (optional, alternative to username/password)

parameters.name: Platform
parameters.description: Target platform (e.g., linux/amd64, linux/arm64). Auto-detects if not specified.
